definitions: Adjust the discharge valves and eliminate hydraulic leaks.
Don't leave the shower on without using it.
Brush your teeth with the tap turned off.
Don't use hoses but buckets to wash car and sidewalks.
Water coming out of the machine at the end of the laundry can be used to clean sidewalks.
Do not throw trash in the river.
Do not throw trash on the beach.
Promote and participate in educational campaigns.
